verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morning <S%G4404><s%> A Counsel <S%G4824><s%> Having Formed <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim, <S%G4892><s%> Having Bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Carried Him Away <S%G667><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered Up Him <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Pilate. <S%G4091><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Sayest. <S%G3004><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Were Accusing <S%G2723><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> Urgently. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Answerest Thou <S%G611><s%> Nothing? <S%G3762><s%> See, <S%G1492><s%> Of How Many Things <S%G4214><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> They Witness Against. <S%G2649><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3765><s%> Not Any More Any Thing <S%G3762><s%> Answered, <S%G611><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate. <S%G4091><s%>
<S%G2596><s%> Now At The <S%G1161><s%> Feast <S%G1859><s%> He Released <S%G630><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Prisoner, <S%G1198><s%> Whomsoever <S%G3746><s%> They Asked. <S%G154><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And There Was <S%G1161><s%> The One <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Associates In Insurrection <S%G4955><s%> Bound, <S%G1210><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Insurrection <S%G4714><s%> Murder <S%G5408><s%> Had Committed. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Crying Out <S%G310><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Beg Him To Do <S%G154><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Always <S%G104><s%> He Did <S%G4160><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Will Ye <S%G2309><s%> I Should Release <S%G630><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%>
<S%G1097><s%> For He Knew <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Envy <S%G5355><s%> Had Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests. <S%G749><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> Stirred Up <S%G383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> He Might Release <S%G630><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Will Ye <S%G2309><s%> I Should Do To Him <S%G4160><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Call <S%G3004><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Cried Out <S%G2896><s%> Crucify <S%G4717><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G1063><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Did He Commit? <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Much More <S%G4056><s%> Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%> Crucify <S%G4717><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> Desiring <S%G1014><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> That Which Was <S%G3588><s%> Satisfactory <S%G2425><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> Released <S%G630><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Having Scourged Him, <S%G5417><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> Led Away <S%G520><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Within <S%G2080><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Court, <S%G833><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Call Together <S%G4779><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Band. <S%G4686><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Put On <S%G1746><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Purple, <S%G4209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Placed On <S%G4060><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Having Platted It <S%G4120><s%> Thorny <S%G174><s%> A Crown, <S%G4735><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Began <S%G756><s%> To Salute <S%G782><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Hail, <S%G5463><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews! <S%G2453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Struck <S%G5180><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> With A Reed, <S%G2563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spat On <S%G1716><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bending <S%G5087><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Knees <S%G1119><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> They Had Mocked <S%G1702><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> They Took Off <S%G1562><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Purple, <S%G4209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put On <S%G1746><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own Garments; <S%G2398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Lead Out <S%G1806><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Crucify <S%G4717><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Compel <S%G29><s%> Passing By <S%G3855><s%> One, <S%G5100><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> A Cyrenian, <S%G2956><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> A Field, <S%G68><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Alexander <S%G223><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rufus, <S%G4504><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Carry <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Bring <S%G5342><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Golgotha <S%G1115><s%> A Place, <S%G5117><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Being Interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> Of A Skull <S%G2898><s%> Place. <S%G5117><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Gave <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Drink <S%G4095><s%> Medicated With Myrrh <S%G4669><s%> Wine; <S%G3631><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Take It. <S%G2983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Crucified <S%G4717><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Divided <S%G1266><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments, <S%G846><s%> Casting <S%G906><s%> A Lot <S%G2819><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Who And <S%G5101><s%> What Each <S%G5101><s%> Should Take. <S%G142><s%>
<S%G2258><s%> And It Was The <S%G1161><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Third, <S%G5154><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Crucified <S%G4717><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inscription <S%G1923><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G156><s%> Of His Accusation <S%G846><s%> Written Up, <S%G1924><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Crucify <S%G4717><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Robbers, <S%G3027><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Left <S%G2176><s%> Of Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> , Says, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3326><s%> Lawless <S%G459><s%> He Was Reckoned. <S%G3049><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Passing By <S%G3899><s%> Railed At <S%G987><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Shaking <S%G2795><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Aha, <S%G3758><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thou Who Destroyest <S%G2647><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Buildest It, <S%G3618><s%>
Save <S%G4982><s%> Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Descend <S%G2597><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross. <S%G4716><s%>

<S%G3668><s%> And In Like Manner <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests, <S%G749><s%> Mocking <S%G1702><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> He Saved, <S%G4982><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Save. <S%G4982><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Israel! <S%G2474><s%> Let Him Descend <S%G2597><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross, <S%G4716><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We May See <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Believe. <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Were Crucified With <S%G4957><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Reproached <S%G3679><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And Being Come The <S%G1161><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Sixth, <S%G1623><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land, <S%G1093><s%> Until The <S%G2193><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Ninth; <S%G1766><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ninth <S%G1766><s%> Cried <S%G994><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Eloi, <S%G1682><s%> Eloi, <S%G1682><s%> Lama <S%G2982><s%> Sabachthani? <S%G4518><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Being Interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> My God, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> My God, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G1519><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Hast Thou Forsaken? <S%G1459><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Standing By <S%G3936><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> He Calls. <S%G5455><s%>

<S%G5143><s%> And Having Run <S%G1161><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Filled <S%G1072><s%> A Sponge <S%G4699><s%> With Vinegar, <S%G3690><s%> Having Put It On <S%G4060><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> A Reed <S%G2563><s%> Gave To Drink <S%G4222><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let Be, <S%G863><s%> Let Us See <S%G1492><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> To Take Down <S%G2507><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Uttered <S%G863><s%> A Cry <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> Expired. <S%G1606><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Veil <S%G2665><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Was Rent <S%G4977><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Top <S%G509><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> Bottom. <S%G2736><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Centurion <S%G2760><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3936><s%> Stood By <S%G1537><s%> Opposite <S%G1727><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Having Cried Out <S%G2896><s%> He Expired, <S%G1606><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Truly <S%G230><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And There Were <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Afar Off <S%G3113><s%> Looking On, <S%G2334><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of James <S%G2385><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Less <S%G3398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Joses <S%G2499><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Salome; <S%G4539><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> , And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Came Up With <S%G4872><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> Being Come, <S%G1096><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> It Was The <S%G2258><s%> Preparation, <S%G3904><s%> That <S%G3739><s%> Is The Day <S%G2076><s%> Before Sabbath, <S%G4315><s%>

Came <S%G2064><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> Who Was <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Arimathea, An <S%G707><s%> Honourable <S%G2158><s%> Counsellor, <S%G1010><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Waiting For <S%G4327><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Having Boldness <S%G5111><s%> He Went In <S%G1525><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Begged <S%G154><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> He Were Dead; <S%G2348><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Centurion <S%G2760><s%> He Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Long <S%G3819><s%> He Had Died. <S%G599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Known It <S%G1097><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Centurion <S%G2760><s%> He Granted <S%G1433><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Bought <S%G59><s%> A Linen Cloth, <S%G4616><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken Down <S%G2507><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Wrapped Him In <S%G1750><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Linen Cloth, <S%G4616><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Laid <S%G2698><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Cut <S%G2998><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> A Rock, <S%G4073><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rolled <S%G4351><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%>
